page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: There are twenty farms in our block, some large and others small.Most are dairy farms and Friesians are the most popular cows though there are a large number of Ayrshires.{CHELFORD}is mainly a farming village. Here is a list of crops grown in{CHELFORD} - grass,corn, wheat,oats,barley, potatoes,maize and oil-seed rape.Most farms are quite modern but still a lot of things are done by hand.Some farms have got only a few old tractors and still use shippons for milking. There are farms which have large and modern tractors and milking parlours and some even have J.C.B earthmovers.Free range pigs,sheep,hens and ducks are also found.{CHELFORD}cattle market is very popular and sells lots of animals, farm implements,fruit,vegetables, flowers and eggs.
